verses.verse: And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H7851>Acacia<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to commit <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and bowed <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6775>joined<s%> himself unto <S%H1187>Baal<s%>–peor: and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and hang them <S%H3363>up<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> against the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, that the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may be turned <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H2026>Kill<s%> you <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H582>men<s%> that were <S%H6775>joined<s%> unto <S%H1187>Baal<s%>–peor.

<S%H376>And<s%>, behold, one of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> unto his <S%H251>brothers<s%> a Midianitish <S%H4084>woman<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who were <S%H1058>weeping<s%> before the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6965>it<s%>, he rose up from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H7420>javelin<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

And he <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H6898>tent<s%>, and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H376>through<s%>, the man of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H413>through<s%> her <S%H6897>belly<s%>. So the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And those that <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4046>plague<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

<S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, has <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, while he was <S%H7065>zealous<s%> for my <S%H7068>sake<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3615>them<s%>, that I consumed not the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.
Therefore <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I give unto him my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>:

And he shall have <S%H2233>it<s%>, and his seed <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1285>him<s%>, even the covenant of an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>; <S%H834>because<s%> he was <S%H7065>zealous<s%> for his <S%H430>God<s%>, and made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H376>Israelite<s%> that was <S%H5221>slain<s%>, even that was <S%H5221>slain<s%> with the Midianitish <S%H4084>woman<s%>, was <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5543>Salu<s%>, a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of a <S%H1>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> among the <S%H8099>Simeonites<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianitish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that was <S%H5221>slain<s%> was <S%H3579>Cozbi<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6698>Zur<s%>; he was <S%H7218>head<s%> over a <S%H523>people<s%>, and of a <S%H1>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

For they <S%H6887>harass<s%> you with their <S%H5231>wiles<s%>, with which they have <S%H5230>beguiled<s%> you in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, and in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H3579>Cozbi<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, their <S%H269>sister<s%>, which was <S%H5221>slain<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4046>plague<s%> for <S%H6465>Peor<s%>'s <S%H1697>sake<s%>.
